languages.text: "Ахти! Да вы што! Сам{mf||а} {mf|Егойная|Еейная} Светлость, да в таких чащах! Такая честь для нас, вот такенная честь!" {n}Мужчина падает на колени и старательно прячет свое огнестрельное недоразумение, изо всех сил делая вид, что секунду назад оно не было направлено вам в грудь.{/n}

"Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ахти! Да вы што! Сам{mf||а} {mf|Егойная|Еейная} Светлость, да в таких чащах! Такая честь для нас, вот такенная честь!" {n}Мужчина падает на колени и старательно прячет свое огнестрельное недоразумение, изо всех сил делая вид, что секунду назад оно не было направлено вам в грудь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joshing me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The old man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm and pretend like he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: “黄金王座在上啊！这真是天大的误会，大人！没想到能在这种破地方见到你！这简直是天大的荣誉！”{n}老人跪在地上，赶紧把他那把破枪藏起来，假装刚刚并没有用它指着你的胸口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上啊！这真是天大的误会，大人！没想到能在这种破地方见到你！这简直是天大的荣誉！”{n}老人跪在地上，赶紧把他那把破枪藏起来，假装刚刚并没有用它指着你的胸口。{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「祝福の王座！冗談でしょう、陛下！こんな僻地で！なんて光栄なんでしょう。この上なく光栄です！」{n}男は膝から崩れ落ち、銃を隠そうと努力した。まるで、さっきまであなたの胸に銃口を向けていた事実がなかったかのように振る舞っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「祝福の王座！冗談でしょう、陛下！こんな僻地で！なんて光栄なんでしょう。この上なく光栄です！」{n}男は膝から崩れ落ち、銃を隠そうと努力した。まるで、さっきまであなたの胸に銃口を向けていた事実がなかったかのように振る舞っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «¡Por el Trono! ¡No me lo puedo creer! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, en este bosque! ¡Es un honor tremendo!». {n}El hombre cae de rodillas e intenta ocultar su lamentable arma, esforzándose por olvidar que te estaba apuntando con ella hace un instante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Por el Trono! ¡No me lo puedo creer! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, en este bosque! ¡Es un honor tremendo!». {n}El hombre cae de rodillas e intenta ocultar su lamentable arma, esforzándose por olvidar que te estaba apuntando con ella hace un instante.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Gesegneter Thron! Ihr wollt mich veräppeln! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hier bei uns am Ende der Welt! Was für eine Ehre, eine mächtig große Ehre ist das!" {n}Der Mann fällt auf die Knie und bemüht sich, seine Farce von Schusswaffe zu verbergen und so zu tun, als habe er sie nicht eben noch auf deine Brust gerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gesegneter Thron! Ihr wollt mich veräppeln! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hier bei uns am Ende der Welt! Was für eine Ehre, eine mächtig große Ehre ist das!" {n}Der Mann fällt auf die Knie und bemüht sich, seine Farce von Schusswaffe zu verbergen und so zu tun, als habe er sie nicht eben noch auf deine Brust gerichtet.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Par le Trône ! J'en reviens pas ! Sa Seigneurie en personne qui vient nous voir dans notre trou paumé ! C'est un sacré honneur, ça ! » {n}Le vieil homme tombe à genoux et tente tant bien que mal de dissimuler son arme, comme s'il ne venait pas de la braquer sur votre poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône ! J'en reviens pas ! Sa Seigneurie en personne qui vient nous voir dans notre trou paumé ! C'est un sacré honneur, ça ! » {n}Le vieil homme tombe à genoux et tente tant bien que mal de dissimuler son arme, comme s'il ne venait pas de la braquer sur votre tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Taht adına! Bir yaşıma daha girdim! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Sizi buralarda görmek ne devlet, ne şeref!" {n}Adam, dizleri üstüne çöküyor. Sonrasında ise daha demin onu tam göğsüne doğrultan kendisi değilmiş gibi rezil silahını elinden geldiğince saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne! You're joking me! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}, in these here backwoods! What an honour, a big ol' honour, this!" {n}The man drops to his knees and tries his best to hide his travesty of a firearm, pretending that he was not just pointing it at your chest a moment ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Taht adına! Bir yaşıma daha girdim! {mf|Lord|Leydi} hazretleri sizi buralarda görmek ne devlet, ne şeref!" {n}Adam dizleri üstüne çöküyor ve rezil silahını elinden geldiğince saklamaya çalışıyor. Daha demin onu tam göğsüne doğrultan o değilmiş gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: OldMan
